Package org.freedomdave.utils.text

Class TextFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freedomdave.utils.text.TextFormatter
  • public class TextFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some simple fixed-width text field formatting methods.

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        public static java.lang.String fill​(int width,
                                    char fillChar)
        Generates a fixed-width text field using a specified fill character.
        Parameters:
        width - [in] The width of the text field to generate.
        fillChar - [in] Character to fill the text field with.
        Returns:
        Fixed width text field filled with the specified character.

      • center

        public static java.lang.String center​(java.lang.String text,
                                      int width,
                                      char padChar)
        Centers text within a fixed width text field
        Parameters:
        text - [in] The text in the field.
        width - [in] The width of the text field (i.e., text will be centered within this width)
        padChar - [in] The character to pad either side of the text in the field (up to the total width)
        Returns:
        A text field of specified width with text centered within it

      • leftJustify

        public static java.lang.String leftJustify​(java.lang.String text,
                                           int width)
        Left-justifies text within a fixed width text field.
        Parameters:
        text - [in] The text within the field.
        width - [in] The total width of the field.
        Returns:
        A text field of fixed width with text left justified (padded to the right)

      • rightJustify

        public static java.lang.String rightJustify​(java.lang.String text,
                                            int width)
        Right-justifies text within a fixed width text field.
        Parameters:
        text - [in] The text within the field.
        width - [in] The total width of the field.
        Returns:
        A text field of fixed width with text right-justified (padded to the left)

      • align

        public static java.lang.String align​(java.lang.String text,
                                     int width,
                                     char padChar,
                                     TextFormatter.Alignment align)
        Justifies text within a fixed width text field.
        Parameters:
        text - [in] The text within the field.
        width - [in] The total width of the field.
        padChar - [in] The character to use when padding text field to specified width.
        align - [in] The desired alignment for the text in the field (i.e. left, right, or center)
        Returns:
        A fixed width text field with the text justified to the specified side.
